title: What are online classes? What are some? - Quora

response.answer_text: Online classes quite literally classes that you take which are delivered online usually through a series of video lectures. Some examples include the academic courses offered online by Duke University, Masterclass which brings celebrities to teach their areas of expertise and those courses that are taught using Kajabi.

online classes are same like classes you went sitting in a class room ,but you can listen where ever you want whenever you want and you can avail for certification also which may helpful in interviews Eg;-coursera,udemy,nptel etc.,
